title: Did USPS lock the mailboxes to limit the 2020 election?
subtitle: The rumors of the mailbox were turned around in 2020, as was the real concern about the United States. The ability of the Postal Service to meet the demand prior to the general elections.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: United States The Postal Service placed locks on the mailboxes to prevent voters from vote by post in the 2020 presidential election.
